CustomField.formula: Approved_Advance_Amount__c - (Origination_Fee__c + Advance_Fee__c + BPO_Appraisal_Fee__c + Doc_Prep_Fee__c + Advance_Fee_Adjustment__c + BPO_Appraisal_Fee_Adjustment__c + Doc_Prep_Fee_Adjustment__c + BlackSquare_Fee__c + BlackSquare_Fee_Adjustment__c + Daily_Interest_Rate__c + Daily_Interest_Rate_Adjustment__c + Inspection_Fee__c + Inspection_Fee_Adjustment__c )
CustomField.label: Net Funding
